successes.title: THE PRONTO: Fast-Charge Battery Pack
successes.description: Store enough power in 5 minutes to charge your phone 0-100% on-the go with the fastest charging portable battery on the market.

Pledges.description: A big thanks for helping us start the Battery Revolution!!
